meanings.sent1: The bombyxes fluttered gracefully in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: I saw many bombyxes flying around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The bombyxes decided to have a dance party under the streetlight.
meanings.sent4: The bombyxes were like delicate dancers in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bombyxes painted the sky with their wings.

meanings.definition: The plural form of bombyx, a type of silk-producing caterpillar.
meanings.sent1: We found a jar full of bombyxes in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bombyxes were busy spinning silk threads.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bombyxes played hide-and-seek in the silk factory.
meanings.sent4: The bombyxes worked tirelessly, weaving a tapestry of silk.
meanings.sent5: The bombyxes transformed mulberry leaves into luxurious silk.
